channel.title: CVE Feed for The Linux Kernel Organization -- linux
channel.description: The latest CVEs for The Linux Kernel Organization -- linux

item.title: CVE-2021-3600|2024-09-04T15:38:28.022Z -- the%20linux%20kernel%20organization -- linux
item.description: It was discovered that the eBPF implementation in the Linux kernel did not properly track bounds information for 32 bit registers when performing div and mod operations. A local attacker could use this to possibly execute arbitrary code.
